"Happy birthday," Jennifer said, rubbing her daughter's belly. "Now what do you want to do?"
15221111.title: Mom gives her a belly rub and things get sexy

15221112.content:

15221112.title: Mom wants Candy to stuff her now

Kristy was her mother's daughter. She loved her body, kept to herself, and was quite aware of the lack of men in the world. You could say he was surprised by the change, and while he was, he enjoyed. Let's get on with the story.

Kristy woke up to a kick in her belly. She tried ignoring it and simply going back to sleep, but then she felt another kick, and another and another until it turned into a storm.
"Ugh, fine," she said in submission and sat herself up. She proceeded to prop herself onto the wall behind her bed and rub her belly. She knew it would be many years before the babies would be born and her mother helped come up with ways to make it easier.
She got up out of bed and moved to the bathroom. There she caught the reflection in the mirror and remembered how cute she was.

They weren't open about this, but then again, in a world where the thing people associate it is anti-gay and it's impossible to have a hetrosexual relationship, people aren't going to like you.
After using the bathroom, Kristy went back to her bedroom to get dressed in something more suitable. She removed her sweat pants and replaced them with leggings. For her torso, she put on a dress shirt, a vest, and a tie. And she finish of her apparel with a fedora.

info.brief_description: A world where everyone is a woman and all women are pregnant. No men and no flat bellies.
info.description:
The year is 2013. On the day that the Mayan calender predicted what was thought to be the end of the world, everyone instead somehow transformed into a woman. Nobody could figure out the explanation for this. One week after the transformations, the expansions started. Every woman was suddenly 9 months pregnant. Some with many children, some with one.

Okay, now for some info:

The pregnancies will last for the entirety of the woman's lives which have been extended for who knows how long. (Around 80,000,000 years)

The pregnancies last around 30,000 years. A woman we be pregnant again in 1,000 years. During that time the women are pressured to eat a lot and gain weight to maintain some kind of a belly.

You will be able to start the story either at

1. The day of the transformation

2. The day of the expansion

3. A few days after the expansion (people are struggling to get used to it)

4. Years after the expansion (things have fallen into normalcy)

Now for the rules:

1. I don't really care how long the additions are, as long as something is happening in it.

2. If you introduce a new character you also need to link to a picture of that character (i.e. find one and save it to a photobucket account or something)

More info and rules will be added as necessary.
